enrichment_data: {"explanation": "Compounds are pure substances formed when two or more different elements chemically combine in fixed proportions, exhibiting properties distinct from their constituent elements.", "urdu_meaning": "مرکبات - دو یا دو سے زائد مختلف عناصر کے مخصوص تناسب میں کیمیائی اتحاد سے بننے والے خالص مادے", "term_type": "compound", "example_sentence": "Sodium chloride (NaCl), a common ionic compound, is formed by the chemical reaction between sodium metal and chlorine gas.", "properties": {"formula": "NaCl (example)", "molar_mass": "58.44 g/mol (for NaCl)", "state_room_temp": "solid (for NaCl)", "hazards": ["Can cause irritation if inhaled (dust)", "Hypertension if overconsumed"]}}

{"explanation": "Contaminants are unwanted substances present in a material or environment that reduce purity, cause harm, or interfere with intended processes.", "urdu_meaning": "آلودہ کرنے والے مادے (Aaloodah karne wale maday) - ناپاک یا غیر مطلوبہ مادے جو کسی شے کی صفائی یا افادیت کو کم کرتے ہیں۔", "term_type": "concept", "example_sentence": "Industrial wastewater often contains toxic contaminants like mercury and lead, requiring treatment before discharge.", "properties": {"key_principle": "Unintended presence of foreign substances causing degradation or hazard", "related_concepts": ["pollution", "purification", "toxicity", "analytical chemistry", "environmental remediation"], "real_world_example": "Testing agricultural soil for pesticide contaminants before crop cultivation"}}

{"explanation": "Density is a physical property defined as mass per unit volume. It describes how much matter is packed into a given space.", "urdu_meaning": "کثافت - مادّے کی کثت یا اِکائی حجم میں کمیت", "term_type": "property", "example_sentence": "The high density of mercury (13.5 g/cm³) explains why iron nails sink in it despite being a liquid.", "properties": {"standard_unit": "g/cm³ or kg/m³", "calculation_formula": "ρ = m/V (density = mass ÷ volume)", "distinguishing_feature": "Intensive property (independent of sample size)", "significance": "Identifies substances, predicts buoyancy, determines purity"}}

{"explanation": "Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) is a complex macromolecule composed of nucleotide chains that carries the genetic instructions for the development, functioning, and reproduction of all known living organisms.", "urdu_meaning": "ڈی این اے - ڈی آکسی رائبو نیوکلیک ایسڈ", "term_type": "concept", "example_sentence": "DNA sequencing relies on the specific hydrogen bonding between complementary nitrogenous bases (adenine-thymine and guanine-cytosine) to replicate genetic information.", "properties": {"key_principle": "Stores genetic information via sequences of nucleotide bases", "related_concepts": ["nucleotide", "double helix", "hydrogen bonding", "polymer", "genetic code"], "real_world_example": "Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) amplifies specific DNA segments using thermal cycling and enzymatic replication."}}
